com.web.oa.base

类 BaseAction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.web.oa.base.BaseAction<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T -
    所有已实现的接口:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<T>, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    ApplicationTemplateAction, FormAction, ForumAction, ForumManagerAction, OrgnizationAction, ProcessDefinitionAction, ReplyAction, RoleAction, TopicAction, UserAction

    public abstract class BaseAction<T>
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<T>
    控制层的抽象： 控制层的类都需要继承ActionSupport 实现ModelDriven 将此类抽象出来 所有的Service组件都通过Spring容器注入
    作者:
    dukangcheng
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action

        ERROR, INPUT, LOGIN, NONE, SUCCESS

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BaseAction()
      获取泛型参数类型 然后根据参数类型利用反射的方式创建Model对象
